  9: */
 10: /*
 11:    User interface for various vector operations added in SLEPc
 12: */

 14: #if !defined(SLEPCVEC_H)
 15: #define SLEPCVEC_H

 17: #include <slepcsys.h>

 19: /* SUBMANSEC = sys */

 21: /* VecComp: Vec composed of several smaller Vecs */
 22: #define VECCOMP  "comp"

 24: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCreateComp(MPI_Comm,PetscInt*,PetscInt,VecType,Vec,Vec*);
 25: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCreateCompWithVecs(Vec*,PetscInt,Vec,Vec*);
 26: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCompGetSubVecs(Vec,PetscInt*,const Vec**);
 27: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCompSetSubVecs(Vec,PetscInt,Vec*);

 29: /* Some auxiliary functions */
 30: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecNormalizeComplex(Vec,Vec,PetscBool,PetscReal*);
 31: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCheckOrthogonality(Vec[],PetscInt,Vec[],PetscInt,Mat,PetscViewer,PetscReal*);
 32: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecCheckOrthonormality(Vec[],PetscInt,Vec[],PetscInt,Mat,PetscViewer,PetscReal*);
 33: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecDuplicateEmpty(Vec,Vec*);
 34: SLEPC_EXTERN PetscErrorCode VecSetRandomNormal(Vec,PetscRandom,Vec,Vec);

 36: /* Deprecated functions */
 37: PETSC_DEPRECATED_FUNCTION("Use VecNormalizeComplex()") static inline PetscErrorCode SlepcVecNormalize(Vec xr,Vec xi,PetscBool c,PetscReal *nrm) {return VecNormalizeComplex(xr,xi,c,nrm);}
 38: PETSC_DEPRECATED_FUNCTION("Use VecCheckOrthogonality()") static inline PetscErrorCode SlepcCheckOrthogonality(Vec *V,PetscInt nv,Vec *W,PetscInt nw,Mat B,PetscViewer viewer,PetscReal *lev) {return VecCheckOrthogonality(V,nv,W,nw,B,viewer,lev);}

 40: #endif
